mapper.insert: insert into tb_pattern(pattern_name, pattern_desc, create_time, last_edit_time, pattern_uploader, pattern_url, pattern_type_id) values (#{patternName},#{patternDesc},now(),now(),#{patternUploader},#{patternUrl},#{patternType.id})
